author: Paul Brennan
title: Europe virus outbreak: Wary steps taken to ease lockdown rules
description: Austria, Spain and Italy lift some movement restrictions but UK to review its curbs as has many unreported deaths.
content:
Three European countries have taken the first steps to partially open their economies after weeks under lockdown, with one eye on the coronavirus numbers, should they rebound.
But the United Kingdom could yet move in the opposite direction, as many elderly c… [+134 chars]
